info.description: This is the API documentation for LMS (Learning Management System)
info.title: LMS API Documentation

get.description: Get detailed summary of a quiz attempt including statistics
get.summary: Get summary of a specific attempt

403.description: Not authorized to view this attempt

get.description: List all courses created by the authenticated user
List all sections in a course

post.description: Create a new section in a course (Owner/Admin only)

get.description: Get the roles of the authenticated user
Generate a mock JWT token for testing API endpoints in Swagger UI. This endpoint is only for testing purposes.
Get all attempts by the current student for a specific quiz
List all content in a section

post.description: Create new content in a section (Owner/Admin only)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
